description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Vaishali district, headquartered in the historic city of Hajipur, Bihar. This office is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement in a region that serves as a critical gateway connecting North Bihar to the state capital via the Mahatma Gandhi Setu. It manages a high volume of commercial traffic and serves one of the most densely populated agricultural and trading hubs in the state.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Yadav Colony Road, Vishunpur Paltu, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
